title: 820-3115 two keys not working on keyboard
message: I have a 820-3115 with the "7" and "U" key not working.  Already replaced the keyboard and still same result. Any ideas??

title: 820-3115 two keys not working on keyboard
message: Measure all pins of keyboard connector on diode mode.

title: 820-3115 two keys not working on keyboard
message: And don't miss to clean the keyboard connector with alcohol and a toothbrush

title: 820-3115 two keys not working on keyboard
message: One of the traces/vias between U5701 and the kb connector could be bad. Follow duke's instructions.
